page.title: 17Wragby_Children's Leisure
page.content:
{WRAGBY SCHOOL SWIMMING POOL { At our school,we have a{swimming {pool.}It was built and paid for by local people but was later given to the County Council.The pool is{10m {long and about 1m deep.}We have{two {swimming lessons a week in school {time,}and the pool is also open three afternoons after school and during the six_weeks' holiday.It is{not an indoor {pool,}so we can only use it in the summer months when the weather is warm.
The pool has been open for ten years and the P.T.A.have just had to buy a new liner because the old one had split.They help by raising money to keep the swimming pool heated and in good repair.
